title: Discord
content:
After [a long period of development](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073520/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28316) finally I released Discord. Inspired in the machine aesthetics and in the human conflict with them, Discord is a flexible family of sixteen fonts designed to be used in a wide range of work. Ready for multilingual support and with advanced OpenType features such as Small Caps and Old Style Numbers.

[Take a look!](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073520/http:/www.nedertype.com/index.php?/project/discord/)

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073520im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PromoTypophile_5544.png)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073520/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/neder/discord/)
author: rafaelneder

comments.content: This sample is stunning. I like Error and Stencil in particular. Congratulations!

Great work, I really like it. :)

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel
